subsections.title: Questions
subsections.content: Answer the following questions about African history.
points:
Which kingdom was famous for its gold trade in West Africa? 
Options: Kingdom of Mali, Kingdom of Egypt, Kingdom of Zimbabwe, Kingdom of Ghana
Answer: Kingdom of Mali

When did the Scramble for Africa take place? 
Options: 1884-1885, 1914-1918, 1950-1960, 1700-1750
Answer: 1884-1885

subsections.title: Questions
subsections.content: Answer the following questions about human rights.
points:
What document outlines the fundamental human rights globally? 
Options: Universal Declaration of Human Rights, Magna Carta, Bill of Rights, Hammurabi's Code
Answer: Universal Declaration of Human Rights

Which right protects freedom of expression? 
Options: Right to Education, Freedom of Speech, Right to Vote, Right to Privacy
Answer: Freedom of Speech

subsections.title: Questions
subsections.content: Answer the following questions on cultural diversity.
points:
What promotes tolerance and understanding in a society? 
Options: Cultural Diversity, Uniformity, Isolation, Monoculture
Answer: Cultural Diversity

Which of the following is an example of cultural diversity? 
Options: Different languages, Single religion, One cuisine, Identical clothing
Answer: Different languages
